We Are Hiring!!
Job Fair on April 23rd, 2016
Read More
 
 
Miracle Software Systems, Inc., a Global Systems Integrator, headquartered in Novi, MI – USA with over 1500 employees located globally is on a fast-track hiring. If you are a highly motivated individual and are waiting to utilize your skills, walk-in with your latest resume, 2 passport size photographs and photocopies of all academic certificates on April 23rd, 2016 (Saturday) at 10:00 AM.

Date: April 23rd, 2016 (Saturday)
Venue: Miracle Heights Hill No.#1, Chinna Rushikonda, Near Rama Naidu Studios
Transport: Buses will be available at Port Stadium, Akkayyapalem VSKP from 8:30 AM to 11:30 AM
Time: 10:00 AM Onwards
